name: Accident On the Simple Rd (prototype)
description:
Short:

Party game about civilians and maniacs (like Among Us/Deceit/Project Winter).

Civilians must repair school bus with spare parts or expulsion of maniacs. In parallel, civilians must satisfy the demands.

Maniacs must prevent civilians.

1 maniac per 6 civilians. There is 9 players maximum mode (2 maniac vs 7 civilians).

All characters are visually different.

Features:

House. Every player has a house. Front house door, supply box (and one empty box) can be opened by house owner only in the begining. House has 3 keys which can be stealed by other players. Key gives possibility to open front house door and boxes. Be aware, backyard garage door in house is broken and opened always. House also has an alarm: it needs just to inform other players about emergency situation in house. Supply box contains items to satisfy the demands. There are 9 demands in the game now. Each supply box has 3 random kind of items, 5 pcs per kind.

Expulsion. To expulsion a player you must stun him/her with cuffs. After that player stuned for 60 secs and others must voted on him/her to expulse. Every player has 2 cuffs per round only.  Player will be expulsed if half or more players vote for him/her.

Maniacs can kill players with 30 secs cooldown. Also they can hide bus spare parts by dropping it in hidden places or eat supplies.

Demands. Some time some players receive the demand. They must satisfy this demand for 120 secs, otherwise they lost 25% hp.

Controls:

WASD - movement

SPACE - jump

LMB - handcuff a player, hold for 0.1sec

RMB (only for maniacs) - attack a player, hold for 0.25sec

Q - show current demand above player's head (give other players info)

E - use: open door/box, take key/spare part

R - drop spare part

ENTER - public chat

F - vote on stuned (handcuffed) player to expulse.
